channel.title: MERN on Kshitijaa Jaglan
channel.description: Recent content in MERN on Kshitijaa Jaglan

item.title: Job Portal
item.description: Created a Job Portal using MERN stack with features to register as applicant or recruiter and apply/create jobs respectively. The aplication also allows allows updation and deletion of jobs and applications as and when required along with options to edit the user profile.
